_header: Sweet Jesu Christ Gods Son of live
_description: The Hours of the Cross — seventeen couplets

BodLiturg104.First Lines:
Swete ihesu cryst goddis sone of lyueþin passion þin
                    croys þin ded þin wondes fiv…
BodLiturg104.Last Lines:
…In oynt he was wyt aromat holi writ to fulleȝornful
                    meynde of his deþ bee in myne wille
